Before you read further, you should know that I now have public notes. Literally, no one asked for this, but I thought it would be fun(ny). They're probably going to be on a single Google Doc. I'm very open to other formats, but for now this will do. I started this today as of January 15th.

Anyways, you've also found my blog. She's a collection of ramblings that I edit to varying degrees on an ongoing basis. Glad you're here!
